name: vhc-wc-catalog-visibility-options
description: Provides the ability to hide prices, or show prices only to authenticated users. Provides the ability to disable e-commerce functionality by disabling the cart.

scripts.zip: zip -r vhc-wc-catalog-visibility-options.zip ./*.php includes languages templates woo-includes -x '**/.DS_Store'

author: Vijay Hardaha <https://twitter.com/vijayhardaha>
